game.title: Find the missing artifact
game.objective: Collect the ancient amulet from the ruins of Elarion
game.description: The ancient amulet, said to grant its bearer immense power, has been stolen! Journey to the ruins of Elarion and retrieve it before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a +5 strength bonus
game.quest-giver: Elder Lothar of the Sunburst Guild

task.objective: Speak with Elder Lothar in Sunburst Town to accept the quest
task.description: Elder Lothar will provide you with more information about the amulet and its location.

task.objective: Travel to the ruins of Elarion
task.description: The ruins are located in the western mountains, a dangerous journey for an adventurer.

task.objective: Search the ruins for the ancient amulet
task.description: The amulet is said to be hidden in a secret room deep within the ruins.
